name: Indivisible
description: Indivisible is an RPG action game. The player has to play as a girl Ajna with incarnation and integration capabilities to explore the game world; needs to fight with monsters and use her true form to unlock the world puzzles. All kinds of heroes will be added in the game. And she will acquire new capabilities, needs more precise defensive strategy to observe, predict the enemy's attack and defeat the enemy in a variety of different environments.

zh_CN.description: Indivisible是一款RPG动作游戏，玩家要操纵一名拥有化身与融合能力的少女Ajna来探索游戏中的世界，需要与怪物进行战斗，要用自己的真正形态去解开世界中的谜题。在游戏中将会加入各种英雄，并获得新的能力，需要更精准的防守策略，观察预判敌人的攻击，在不同的环境下战胜各种敌人。
zh_CN.name: Indivisible
